#Description of the project

= Introduction =

UDE - wow - tcg


= Details =

Features:
  * *Manage whole cards* (search, filter, ...)
  * *Manage own collection* (cards owned, cards wanted, cards tradable...)
  * *Deck construction* (including restriction and exception)
  * *Trading mechanism* (Export, online capabilities ???)

Database creation:
  * Using sevral xml files, one per release (Crafted item or promotional cards tbd)
  * Squeleton of the xml file:
{{{
   <card id=""
        name=""
	faction=""
	type=""
	supertype=""
	subtype=""
	keywords=""
	race=""
	class=""
	allowedrace=""
	allowedtalent=""
	allowedprofession=""

	talent=""
	professions=""
	cost=""
	atk=""

	def=""

	<cardtext> </cardtext>
	<flavortext> </flavortext>
   </card>

}}}
